duckdb._comment: MotherDuck/DuckDB query tool — use MOTHERDUCK_TOKEN env var. Allows cross-database queries across PROD_EODHD, GoldenOpp, qgsi, and DEV_EODHD_DATA. read-write required for DEV table operations.

memory._comment: Structured knowledge graph for cross-session project facts. Stores entities and relations that persist between Claude sessions. Use for tracking active tasks, discovered patterns, and system state.

fetch._comment: Web content and academic paper retrieval. Used for fetching SSRN papers, financial data documentation, EODHD API docs, and reference material during strategy research.

_instructions.how_to_merge: Copy the contents of mcpServers into your ~/.claude/mcp_config.json under the existing mcpServers key. Do not replace the entire file — merge the keys.
_instructions.motherduck_token: Set MOTHERDUCK_TOKEN as a system environment variable or in your shell profile. Never hardcode in config files.

prerequisites.uvx: Install via: pip install uv (or winget install astral-sh.uv on Windows)
prerequisites.mcp-server-motherduck: Installed automatically by uvx on first run
